## FieldColour.doClassValidation\_() method

Ensure that the input value is a valid colour.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_newValue | any | <i>(Optional)</i> The input value. |
